original_title: ประถม มัธยม เปรี้ยวอมหวาน
overview: Hardly anyone in school wouldn’t know or hear of Glon and Lacquer, two very close knit brothers. They are only different in age, but their wits and charms are very compatible, weather it’s love or play. They both open an accessories shop to help their parents. All the fun and complicated story begins.
title: Middle School Life
